ai-kv7.5:1.3_0: When contacts, feeling is growing, perception, choices, and consciousness grows.
ai-kv7.5:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.5:2.3_0: The tree grows in it like a dream, if it were growing in the wind, it grows in a tree trough.
ai-kv7.5:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.5:3.3_0: Giving, they don’t have the merit.
ai-kv7.5:3.9_0: He knows where there is no offense for one who teaches.
ai-kv7.5:3.10_0: And if he is not available, his trader is apprehended.
ai-kv7.5:3.11_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.5:3.17_0: He becomes familiar with the gorge of it.
ai-kv7.5:3.24_0: He is constantly, he can’t be told,
ai-kv7.5:4.3_0: gives a gift to sensual, malicious, and cruel thoughts.
ai-kv7.5:4.6_0: is included by two kinds of mind:
ai-kv7.5:4.7_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.5:4.9_0: is included by two kinds of mind:
ai-kv7.5:4.11_0: Skillful qualities are profitable and unprofitable; inferior and superior states on the side of darkness and on the side of bright.
ai-kv7.5:4.12_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.5:4.13_0: Skillful qualities are profitable and unprofitable; inferior and superior states on the side of darkness and on the side of bright.
ai-kv7.5:4.16_0: “Mendicants, these four things are very far apart.
ai-kv7.5:4.20_0: The near and the far shore of the ocean. ...
ai-kv7.5:4.22_0: Where the sun rises and where it sets. ...
ai-kv7.5:4.23_0: this is the third terrible lake.
ai-kv7.5:4.24_0: The teaching of the virtuous and the teaching of the wicked. ...
ai-kv7.5:4.25_0: this is the fourth terrible thing.
ai-kv7.5:4.26_0: These are the four things very far apart.
ai-kv7.5:5.1_0: The sky is far from the earth;
ai-kv7.5:5.2_0: they say the other shore of the ocean is far;
ai-kv7.5:5.3_0: and where the sun rises is far
ai-kv7.5:5.4_0: from where that shining one sets.
ai-kv7.5:5.5_0: But even further apart than that, they say,
ai-kv7.5:5.6_0: is the teaching of the virtuous from the wicked.
ai-kv7.5:6.1_0: The company of the virtuous is reliable;
ai-kv7.5:6.2_0: if it is so long as it is standed;
ai-kv7.5:6.3_0: for they quickly entertain non-human beings.
ai-kv7.5:6.4_0: and so the teaching of the virtuous is far from the wicked.”
ai-kv7.5:7.4_0: “He is skilled in what is unskillful and blameworthy, inferior and superior, and those on the side of dark and bright.”
ai-kv7.5:9.4_0: and those who give a residence.
ai-kv7.5:10.3_0: Firm in principle, accomplished in conduct,
ai-kv7.5:11.3_0: for one grows in wealth and merit.
ai-kv7.5:12.5_0: “Mendicants, there are these four kinds of overflowing merit, overflowing goodness. They nurture happiness and are conducive to heaven, ripening in happiness and leading to heaven. They lead to what is likable, desirable, agreeable, to welfare and happiness.
ai-kv7.5:12.7_0: When a mendicant enters and remains in a limitless immersion of heart while using a robe ...
ai-kv7.5:12.10_0: medicines and supplies for the sick, the overflowing of merit for the donor is limitless ...
ai-kv7.5:12.11_0: These are the four kinds of overflowing merit, overflowing goodness. They nurture happiness and are conducive to heaven, ripening in happiness and leading to heaven. They lead to what is likable, desirable, agreeable, to welfare and happiness.”
ai-kv7.5:12.14_0: for one grows in wealth and merit.
ai-kv7.5:13.3_0: if they give a gift, but not the receiver of it, and use it them;
ai-kv7.5:13.5_0: if he gives a gift after being made, he gives it away, and uses it away, he drops it away.
ai-kv7.5:14.3_0: When they give gifts, the receivers take it, rulers or bandits take it, or fire consumes it or flood.
ai-kv7.5:14.5_0: And if he gives a gift, gives it to the ruler, or the receivers take it, or fire consumes it, or flood sweps it away, or unloved heirs take it.
ai-kv7.5:14.8_0: The discussion of making merit is finished.
